column1: The cold and snowy weather couldn’t stop yesterday’s #WomensMarch2020 in Wilkes-Barre! This passion and leadership inspires me to continue fighting for equality and women’s rights. #WomensRightsAreHumanRights https://t.co/btes1nq8f9

This weekend is a time to honor the legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. but it’s also a reminder that it’s up to us to continue the fight for equality for all Americans. Special thanks to David Yonki & the Wilkes-Barre NAACP for inviting me to kick off #MLKDay weekend with you. https://t.co/vUJGjqkyUF

Many older Americans are being pushed out of their jobs before they are financially secure enough to retire.  Today I voted to restore protections for older workers enabling them to fight age discrimination and demand the dignity & respect in the workplace they deserve. #POWADA https://t.co/r92NVkP4rm

BREAKING: My bill to clean up abandoned coal mines in Northeastern PA and across the U.S. just passed in the @NRDems Committee! This is an important step to ensuring communities are protected from the health and safety hazards of abandoned mines. https://t.co/uMv31qLmtp

But Leader McConnell has buried these bills in his legislative graveyard among the 275 we passed last year with the support of both Republicans and Democrats. We need the Senate to hold votes on these bills #ForThePeople https://t.co/7Q6KQiczjm

.@HouseDemocrats are delivering on our promise to make our economy work for all Americans. We have passed bills to:  ✔️Bring drug prices down ✔️Give low-income Americans a raise ✔️Empower people in the workplace

There are many reasons why I'm fighting to #ProtectOurCare as a lawsuit threatens to overturn the #ACA and strip protections from people with pre-existing conditions.   Here are 5329500 ⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/EAklpOrKWI

As the representative for PA’s Eighth Congressional District I’m committed to working in Congress to get things done for the people of #NEPA. Please take my short survey and let me know what your top priorities are as we continue our work in 2020. https://t.co/BKH4e1yWek https://t.co/iUpQxkIyzb
We must do all we can to provide relief for our fellow citizens in Puerto Rico and help them recover. 4/4

That's why I joined 56 of my House colleagues in calling on the White House to issue a major disaster declaration for Puerto Rico which ensures they can get the additional emergency assistance from the federal government that they desperately need. 3/4

The recent earthquakes are just the latest in a series of disasters that have hit the island in the past few years and they have destroyed homes businesses and schools. Thousands are now sleeping outdoors. 2/4
My heart goes out to the people of #PuertoRico and the residents of Pennsylvania's Eighth Congressional District who have family there. 1/4

.@HouseDemocrats have advanced an improved #USMCA that protects American manufacturing workers helps lower prescription drug prices and enables PA dairy farmers to better access Canadian markets and grow their businesses. It's now up to the Senate to pass it. https://t.co/mRyb0QYVo8

#PFAS chemicals are “forever chemicals” that have been found to cause cancer & other diseases and millions of Americans across the U.S. have been exposed to them through their drinking water.  Today I voted for the PFAS Action Act to prevent the spread of these toxic chemicals. https://t.co/5HCiLO3YM9

On this #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay I am grateful for the brave men and women who work each and every day to keep our NEPA communities and our country safe. Thank you for all you do! https://t.co/ErEMoaMzaC

The #ACA guarantees that 282000 people in NEPA with pre-existing conditions like diabetes & cancer can #GetCovered. But if the courts overturn it they will no longer be protected. As this lawsuit continues @HouseDemocrats are working to #ProtectOurCare https://t.co/nvaGvROvs1
I’m keeping our troops and their families in my prayers tonight after the Iranian missile attacks on U.S. bases in Iraq. We need to de-escalate this situation.
It was a privilege to thank these brave #NEPA veterans and honor their service and sacrifice to our nation. https://t.co/KkMOoYeG8h

After the recent 5th Circuit Court ruling against the #ACA health insurance coverage for 59000 people in #NEPA is at risk.   I will keep fighting to #ProtectOurCare in the 8th District and make it more affordable. https://t.co/PRZbRlpNlR https://t.co/IVpBsE975T

Big drug companies are raising prices on hundreds of drugs AGAIN this year in the U.S. This is exactly why we passed #HR3 the #LowerDrugCosts Now Act – to put an end to this price gouging.  The American people need Senator McConnell to hold a vote on HR3. https://t.co/ChS02KOmOX
Happy New Year! May 2020 be a happy healthy and prosperous year for all in Northeastern Pennsylvania. https://t.co/OoIUOuOYey

I’m proud of the legislation we’ve advanced constituents we’ve helped and federal money we’ve brought back to #NEPA in 2019. It is an honor to serve and I look forward to continuing to fight for the 8th District in the New Year! https://t.co/xSYiYIg5si

2019 was a year of strong progress for our local economy. I’ll continue working to drive even more investment and job creation in Northeastern Pennsylvania in 2020. Here’s to continued success in the New Year! https://t.co/06VpII0iIJ
So much of the progress we have made as a nation was won because of @repjohnlewis's courage and fighting spirit.  Praying for him now as he fights this battle against cancer.

From advancing a fair and enforceable #USMCA to passing legislation to boost Americans’ paychecks @HouseDemocrats have fought hard for working people this year. We will keep this up in 2020. #ForThePeople https://t.co/QKMS51ZtJy

This year @HouseDemocrats fought to #ProtectOurCare by passing bills to:  ✔️Lower the cost of lifesaving prescription drugs ✔️Support America's seniors ✔️Combat the opioid epidemic  And much more. Our work continues in 2020. #ForThePeople https://t.co/JZnWLIZDT5
We need fiscally responsible tax policies that help working families expand the middle-class and ensure the rich and big corporations pay their fair share.

Republicans claimed the GOP tax law would raise wages for workers but it’s clear big corporations have used these tax windfalls to make their wealthy investors and CEOs even richer in the past 2 years. https://t.co/lFCupoqONQ
From my family to yours #MerryChristmas wishes to all those who celebrate. May God's light shine upon you today and always. https://t.co/CRO4TECh35

Pleased to join Mayor Tom Blaskiewicz as West Pittston turned on new street lights this evening. This is a great example of all levels of government working together to improve community safety. https://t.co/an0G6hkCBX
Wishing you a Hanukkah full of beauty and light! #HanukkahSameach https://t.co/2vAxw4nAZB

BIG NEWS: The #USMCA has just passed the House! This is an important win for NEPA's manufacturing workers and farmers. It sets better standards that defend American jobs and opens Canadian markets for dairy farmers in our area. https://t.co/2l9XkFNjHW

This decision puts the health coverage of millions of Americans in jeopardy. We must continue to stand up against Republican attacks on our health care laws and protect the #ACA https://t.co/sCDNOXkvjl

We've passed 275+ bills #ForThePeople with Democratic & Republican support in the House this year – bills to make health care more affordable boost hard-working Americans’ wages help veterans & more – that are being blocked by the Senate GOP. The American people deserve action. https://t.co/ByaY6q0vy8

BREAKING: The funding I fought for to improve stormwater systems in #NEPA is included in the federal spending package that we'll vote on this week. It will help bring down local stormwater fees and ease the burden on homeowners & landowners in our area. https://t.co/iQLbCBcVxj
Today is the LAST DAY of the Health Insurance Marketplace open enrollment period for 2020. Be sure to visit https://t.co/sfJUfh522i and #GetCovered today. https://t.co/biW9rnWW60
Open enrollment in the Health Insurance Marketplace ends this Sunday December 15th. Don’t miss your chance to #GetCovered for 2020. Sign up at: https://t.co/3ADfGGnnUu https://t.co/v9nwbTp9wu

Happy birthday PA! On this day in 1787 Pennsylvania was the 2nd state admitted to the Union. Visit @LibraryCongress online to learn more about our humble beginnings including original maps of our #NEPA counties. https://t.co/BzgJf9V6Q0

The cost of prescription drugs has spiraled out of control. Today I was proud to vote for the #LowerDrugCosts Now Act legislation that will empower Medicare to negotiate prices and ensure Americans aren’t charged more than consumers in other countries. https://t.co/0jCBR0Zro5
Under the #LowerDrugCosts Now Act the 1100000+ PA residents living with diabetes could spend 3.5 times LESS on insulin. It’s time for the House to pass this bill! #HR3 https://t.co/JAVxTYNbCe

The House has been working #ForThePeople all year by passing 275+ bipartisan bills. Where are these bills now? Piled high on @senatemajldr’s desk waiting to be voted on. It’s time for Leader McConnell to put politics aside and get the Senate back to work. https://t.co/Z7Cwr8G8UZ

Nobody knows the importance of having a better trade agreement than we do in Northeastern Pennsylvania. I’m pleased that my colleagues have been able to work with the Trump administration to reach a stronger #USMCA for American workers. https://t.co/vY5q3TaPBb

The administration's new #SNAP proposal would clearly make it harder for struggling families to feed their children. We must protect this essential program that helps thousands of Northeastern Pennsylvanians put food on their tables. https://t.co/I44xDV3aGt

Today on National Pearl Harbor Remembrance Day we honor the more than 3000 Americans who were killed or wounded; despite overwhelming odds they fought back heroically inspiring our nation. #PearlHarborRemembranceDay https://t.co/VhutYIt6az

#HR4 the Voting Rights Advancement Act has passed the House!  Today's House action is an important step to ensuring that all Americans can freely participate in the democratic process and make their voices heard. #RestoreTheVote

Scam robocalls put peoples' personal privacy and financial well-being at risk. The House passed the TRACED Act today to protect Americans from these dangerous scams and #StopBadRobocalls once and for all. https://t.co/4rURjAnydz
Cancer medication prices are surging in the U.S. Congress must pass the #LowerDrugCosts Now Act to help the nearly 80000 cancer patients in PA save on their medical bills. https://t.co/KUeV8C8iHm

.@HouseDemocrats have passed hundreds of bills #ForThePeople this year to boost Americans' paychecks expand health coverage support our veterans and more.   Yet @senatemajldr refuses to act on them even though most of them have Republican support. https://t.co/fPQWgT2Dtw

When people with #disabilities are empowered to fully participate in their communities everyone benefits. I’m committed to making sure disabled persons are equipped with the knowledge and tools to succeed. #InternationalDisabilityDay https://t.co/c90L25Ko75

Did you know that there are 300+ abandoned mine sites in NEPA? Many of these contaminate our drinking water and endanger the communities nearby. My bill to continue the clean-up of these sites will save lives create jobs and protect our environment. https://t.co/pl1dmFX0CP
Small businesses drive the NEPA economy and make our communities stronger. Please support our local entrepreneurs this #SmallBusinessSaturday and #ShopSmall! https://t.co/9dRmLRaR0V
I'm thankful for my family friends and the honor of working on behalf of #PA08 in Congress. Wishing everyone a happy and healthy #Thanksgiving. https://t.co/KPeBEK5dfT

Health care and social service professionals are more likely to be victims of #WorkplaceViolence than any other type of worker. I voted in favor of #HR1309 today to provide new protections for caregivers in NEPA and keep them safe at work. https://t.co/IuubHGRaWK

Open Enrollment in the Health Insurance Marketplace closes December 15. Make sure you #GetCovered on https://t.co/gstbW5qErR for 2020. https://t.co/z5zC5GpMsZ

Today we honor the workers and unions who fought for some of our most basic rights including the minimum wage and the 40-hour work week. As we honor our history let’s also keep up the fight to protect workers and grow our middle class. Happy #LaborDay!

@MarkJor16989285 @BetoORourke Mark you are correct my mistake. In fact Rep Coffman (R-CO) introduced it but Rep. O’Rourke did muscle it through his subcommittee which deals with veterans mental health speaking on it in committee and on the floor.

@MarkJor16989285 @BetoORourke Mark thanks for the shoutout and thank you for your service. But I can’t really take credit here. Beto is referencing the Veteran Urgent Access to Mental Healthcare Act.  It’s a bill he introduced that got included in the budget agreement last Congress and did get made law. Matt
